mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PROJECT_INFO (PROJECT_NAME, PROJECT_DAY, PROJECT_CONTENTS, REG_DT, REG_ID, CHG_ID, IMG_SAVE_PATH) VALUES (#{project_name}, #{project_day}, #{project_contents}, SYSDATE(), #{reg_id}, #{reg_id}, #{img_save_path})

INSERT INTO FILE_INFO(PROJECT_SEQ, ORIGINAL_FILE_NAME, STORED_FILE_NAME, FILE_SIZE, REG_DT, REG_ID, CHG_ID) VALUES (#{project_seq}, #{original_file_name}, #{stored_file_name}, #{file_size}, SYSDATE(), #{reg_id}, #{reg_id})
mapper.select: SELECT PROJECT_SEQ, PROJECT_NAME, PROJECT_DAY, PROJECT_CONTENTS, REG_ID, CHG_DT, IMG_SAVE_PATH FROM PROJECT_INFO WHERE REG_ID = #{reg_id}
SELECT PROJECT_CONTENTS AS project_contents FROM project_info WHERE reg_ID = #{userId}

SELECT PROJECT_SEQ AS project_seq, PROJECT_NAME AS project_name, PROJECT_CONTENTS AS project_contents, PROJECT_DAY AS project_day, IMG_SAVE_PATH AS img_save_path, FILE_SAVE_PATH AS file_save_path FROM project_info WHERE PROJECT_SEQ = #{project_seq}
